body:
The main character sits in front of a girl that he is kinda interested in but has never talked to her.  He's imagining what she is like when she's having sex and doesn't know if she's in a relationship or not.  Whenever he passes papers to her she doesn't really talk to him.  Theres a part where the MC thinks she is sleeping with her senpai's boyfriend in the track and field club (just delusion from the MC)

One day when going home they see each other and they have a conversation.  That  night MC has a dream that he has sex with her.  The next morning when he passes papers back to her she greets him (instead of not saying anything)
The author is notorious for works which seem dark at the first glance, but actually really sweet.

Nah it's kinda nice story. The mc likes the girl who sits behind him in class and imagines her having sex, at first with nameless somebody, then with the guy she often speaks to. The day she talks to mc at the bus stop he has a dream of having sex with her. Then, at the end, she speaks to him in class for the first time.
I don't need sleep I need answers

Not sure what's going on, it initially looked like to me she was in some sort of a sexual service, not sure about those papers, seemed like sex requests or something. Well, @checkchu could be right about that. She would be fantasizing about the men that come around her, but that doesn't explain the use of her reading the papers and then hand in? Is there any significance? Because it appeared four times and each time was right before a fuck session with a man (except last one but it sorta implied another fucking coming right up).
She's fucking every man she speake?
so she is imagining it with the person in front of her.
